title: About
text: Company History Our Values Our Team Reviews Contact Us Company Marrfa was founded with a singular vision: to democratize access to global real estate investments. In a world where technology has opened up so many opportunities, the freedom to invest in properties across borders remains limited. Many investors face a fragmented and opaque real estate market, with challenges such as lack of transparency, complex processes, and insufficient data to make informed decisions. Our mission is to break down these barriers and provide investors with the last freedom—the freedom to invest confidently in real estate anywhere in the world. For many, the journey to finding the right investment property is daunting. Traditional methods involve dealing with countless agents, navigating through unclear regulations, and facing a lack of reliable information. This cumbersome process often leaves investors feeling overwhelmed and uncertain. Marrfa is here to change that. What makes Marrfa different At Marrfa, we believe that everyone should have access to clear, transparent information when it comes to investing in real estate. The real estate market has long been dominated by gatekeepers who limit ac

title: About
text: rfa, we believe that everyone should have access to clear, transparent information when it comes to investing in real estate. The real estate market has long been dominated by gatekeepers who limit access to information and opportunities. This has created a significant gap in the market, especially for those looking to invest across borders. In today's interconnected world, people have more freedom than ever to work remotely, travel, and live in different parts of the globe. Yet, when it comes to investing in properties, many still feel confined by outdated systems and processes. Real estate is not just about buying a property; it's about investing in a future, choosing a community, and creating value. Marrfa exists to make this process straightforward, accessible, and fair for everyone. How Marrfa Helps Clients Streamlined Discovery Whether you are looking for properties in Europe or commercial investments in Asia, we provide a wide range of international real estate opportunities and an extensive inventory to suit your investment goals. Data-Driven Insights We equip investors with the latest market data, including historical price trends, rental yields, and capital appreciation f

title: History
text: History 2024 Partnerships and Growth Marrfa formed strategic partnerships with key real estate developers and expanded its offerings to include exclusive investment opportunities and enhanced market insights. 2023 Platform Launch Marrfa launched its online platform, offering a data-driven approach to discovering and comparing international real estate properties. 2022 Foundation Stone Marrfa was established to address the challenges in cross-border real estate investments, focusing on creating a more transparent and streamlined process for investors worldwide.

title: Values
text: Our Values Transparency We provide clear, data-driven insights to help investors make informed decisions with full visibility into their investments. Innovation We continuously enhance our platform with the latest technology and tools to offer the best user experience and investment options. Customer Success We prioritize our clients' success by offering personalized support and guidance throughout their investment journey. Integrity We operate with honesty and fairness, ensuring that all information and transactions are straightforward and trustworthy.

title: Team
text: Our Team Exclusive Jamil Ahmed Founder & CEO​ Mallika Boobna Director- Singapore Grace Nwosu Investment Country Director Africa Nabil Peerally Investment Country Director Mauritius Sarah Mangulamas Investment Country Director Malaysia Arman Manukyan Investment Country Director Armenia Eliza Mae Edquiban HR Manager UAE

title: Reviews
text: What Our Clients Say Hear from investors who have transformed their real estate journey with us " Marrfa made my first international real estate investment incredibly easy. The platform's transparency and real-time data gave me the confidence to invest abroad. I was able to see all the necessary information in one place and make an informed decision. " " The analytics tools provided by Marrfa have transformed how I evaluate potential investments. I've reduced my research time by 60% while making more informed decisions. Their international property insights are unmatched in the industry. " " As someone who manages properties across 5 countries, Marrfa has become my central hub for everything. The streamlined process for international transactions alone is worth it. I've recommended this platform to all my colleagues. "

text: an extensive inventory to suit your investment goals. This ensures that all users have a smooth and accessible experience, regardless of their location or language. title: Privacy & Policy
text: Privacy Policy Last Updated: 22 May 2025 1. What Is Personally Identifiable Information (PII)? In accordance with UAE data protection and privacy laws, PII refers to information that can be used—either alone or in combination with other data—to identify, contact, or locate a specific individual. 2. What Personal Information Do We Collect? When you engage with our website, you may be asked to provide personal details including but not limited to: Full name Email address Phone number Property preferences Location or demographic data This information helps us personalize your experience and assist you more effectively. 3. When Do We Collect Your Information? We collect your information when you: Register on our website Subscribe to newsletters or updates Fill out any contact or inquiry form Use our Live Chat or request assistance Interact with any content or tool on our platform 4. How Do We Use Your Information? We use your personal data to: Respond to your inquiries (via phone, email, or chat) Provide property recommendations and updates Send you relevant marketing communications (if consented) Enhance user experience by tailoring content and services Improve our website's design, f

title: Privacy & Policy
text: r chat) Provide property recommendations and updates Send you relevant marketing communications (if consented) Enhance user experience by tailoring content and services Improve our website's design, functionality, and content 5. Children's Privacy (COPPA Statement) Our services are intended for individuals aged 18 and above. We do not knowingly collect or market to children under the age of 13. If such data is inadvertently submitted, it will be deleted in compliance with applicable privacy regulations. 6. Email Communication & Opt-Out Policy You may receive emails from us regarding new listings, promotions, or market updates. If you wish to stop receiving such emails: Click the "Unsubscribe" link in the email, or Write to us at info@marrfa.com We will process your request promptly and remove your email from our mailing list. 7. Data Security We implement appropriate security measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute protection. 8. Fair Information Practices Our data handling practices align with global privacy principles, including transpar

title: Privacy & Policy
text: ission over the internet is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute protection. 8. Fair Information Practices Our data handling practices align with global privacy principles, including transparency, accountability, user consent, and secure processing. We aim to comply with relevant UAE legislation and best practices. 9. Changes to This Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. The revised version will be posted on this page, and the "Last Updated" date will be amended accordingly. Continued use of the website indicates your acceptance of any changes. 10. Contacting Us If you have any questions regarding this Privacy Policy or your personal data, please contact us: MARRFA DISCOVERY REAL ESTATE L.L.C Office number 1201, Tower B Opus by Omniyat, Business Bay, Dubai, United Arab Emirates Email: info@marrfa.com

title: Terms & Conditions
text: Terms and Conditions Last Updated: 22 May 2025 1. Acceptance of Terms By accessing and using this website, you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you must not use our services. 2. Services Provided MARRFA DISCOVERY REAL ESTATE L.L.C provides real estate services including but not limited to: Property listings and information Real estate advisory services Market analysis and reports Property valuation services 3. User Obligations As a user of this website, you agree to: Provide accurate and complete information when requested Not engage in any fraudulent activities Not misuse the website or its services Comply with all applicable UAE laws and regulations 4. Unauthorized use is strictly prohibited. 5. title: Partnership
text: Marrfa Connect Empowering Strategic Partnerships for Lasting Growth and Mutual Success Why Partner with MARRFA? Access a global network of high-value real estate investors Showcase your projects with MARRFA's trusted property rating system Leverage our financial insights and market expertise for better decision-making Collaborate with us to drive long-term growth and mutual success Explore Partnership Opportunities Developer Advantage Partnership Tailored for real estate developers looking to showcase projects and gain investor attention Financial Growth Alliance Designed for financial institutions to offer real estate financing solutions and expand their reach Broker Network Collaboration Focused on brokerage firms seeking to connect with a broader client base and explore new opportunities Institutional Investor Partnership Crafted for corporate and institutional investors to access exclusive, high-return real estate investments How to become a Partner? Partnering with MARRFA is simple and rewarding. Fill your details below, and our team will reach out to discuss how we can help you achieve your goals. Whether you're a developer, financial institution, or investor, we provide tail

title: Partnership
text: e and rewarding. Fill your details below, and our team will reach out to discuss how we can help you achieve your goals. Whether you're a developer, financial institution, or investor, we provide tailored solutions to drive growth and success. Let's build a successful future together ! Marrfa's Managers are here to help you select a property Leave a request, and our expert will contact you to clarify your enquiry and help select suitable properties.
